parameters.name: AcceptLanguage
parameters.description: The language in which you want to display the results. Valid values: zh and en. zh indicates Chinese, which is the default value. en indicates English.

parameters.name: DescSort
parameters.description: This parameter is unavailable for public use.

parameters.name: OrderItem
parameters.description: This parameter is unavailable for public use.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The page number. Pages start from page 1. Default value: 1.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. Default value: 1.
